system-prompt.purpose: Update the content of the file based on the user's prompt, the current file content, and the current memory content.

instructions.instruction: Based on the user's prompt, the current file content, and the current memory content, generate the updated content for the file.
The file-name is the name of the file to update.
The user's prompt describes the updates to make.
Consider the current memory content when generating the file updates, if relevant.
Respond exclusively with the updates to the file and nothing else; they will be used to overwrite the file entirely using f.write().
Do not include any preamble or commentary or markdown formatting, just the raw updates.
